Senior Frontend Engineer

Job Responsibilities

  • Communicate with product owner and UX designer to understand requirements
  • Make appropriate design and architecture trade-offs for new features
  • Code with the latest version of JavaScript frameworks to build high-quality products
  • Review code with peers to surface design and implementation issues
  • Identify risks and dependencies in development life cycle
  • Write unit test and automated functional test for features
  • Account for the performance, operation and serviceability of user experience
  • Learn cutting-edge technologies and evaluate if our system can benefit from it. - - Innovative attitude is very welcome during our daily work.

Job Requirements

  • B.S. or above in Software Engineering, Computer Science, or related discipline
  • 3+ years frontend development experience and 1+ years frontend architecture experience
  • In-depth knowledge of object-oriented programming and patterns
  • In-depth knowledge of JavaScript, HTML5, CSS, WXSS, WXML
  • Proficient in React/Vue and corresponding technology stack
  • Familiar with HTTP(s) protocol and RESTful specifications
  • Teamwork ability with passion & energy
  • Good written and oral English skills is a plus
  • Familiar with web3 technology is a plus

Senior Python Software Engineer

è‹±è¯­å£è¯­å¥½ï¼Œä¼š Java ä¼˜å…ˆè€ƒè™‘

Responsibilities:

As a Senior Python Engineer, you will be a senior member of the team in China, entrusted

with the responsibility to set the agenda and structure of the work of you and your software colleagues.

You will participate in the full development life-cycle, from definition and design to product delivery. You will propose creative software design ideas and work on every level of the stack (frontend to backend), from start-to-finish.

Your code will be primarily written in Python.

You will be expected to design, develop, test, maintain and improve software while working in an agile environment.

You will take ownership of sprints, manage deadlines and deliverables, and keep up to date on new technologies.

Recruiting Requirement

You must have:

  • Expert-level programming skills in Python (and its associated libraries)
  • High-level programming skills in Java
  • University degree in Software Engineering, Computer Science, Machine Learning, Robotics Engineering, Information Systems or a related discipline â€“ Minimum 3-4 years full-time work experience in a role which required you to write code as part of the delivery of a commercial software project or web site
  • Experience designing software architecture and software structure to meet commercial requirements â€“ Strong de-bugging skills in Python and Linux â€“ Ability to foresee potential issues before they emerge and take proactive action to avoid them â€“ Strong ability to proactively organise, prioritise and structure the tasks of you and your software colleagues â€“ Strong communication skills and teamwork capabilities
